text: Leopold II may mean: * Leopold II, Grand Duke of Tuscany, Grand Duke of Tuscany * Leopold II, Holy Roman Emperor, Archduke of Austria * Leopold II, Margrave of Austria, fifth Margrave of Austria * Leopold II, Prince of Anhalt- Dessau, Prussian general * Leopold II, Prince of Lippe, eldest child of Leopold I and Princess Pauline * Leopold II of Belgium, king of Belgium from 1835 until 1909
title: Leopold II
